channel.title: 3.5 on Sander Schutten's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in 3.5 on Sander Schutten's Blog

item.title: How-To: New ASP.NET 3.5 Extensions Video Screencasts
item.description: From the almighty Scott Hanselman: Released today are four new screencasts about the ASP.NET 3.5 Extensions by various members of the ASP.NET team. Every video is available in numerous formats, and note that this also includes re-encoded versions of my **Intro to MVC Screencast **in a pile of formats including an iPod/iTouch compatible format, as well as ones for the **Zune **and **PSP **and a utterly unwatchable ðŸ˜‰ 40 meg 3GP one for 3G Phones.
